resources.string: Você instalou o app em um cartão SD?
O Android Boot Manager não está disponível para este dispositivo (%1$s).
Parece que você não olhou está página, isso não é bom!
Agora você será perguntado pelo arquivo do DroidBoot, Tenha certeza que é o correto para o seu dispositivo
Se você aperta OK, o ABM será instalado. Essa é a última confirmação!

Return code is %1$sWhen the Return Code is ERROR, something went wrong. Please flash the uninstaller and ask in our Telegram group @andbootmgr. Don\'t forget the log file at /sdcard/abm/install.log! If the Return Code is OK, the installation was successful. You should reboot now.
I am NOT root. Something went wrong!
The source is available here: %1$s\nThe README is available here: %2$s
Disable device check (if you spoof fingerprint)
I accept the risk, allow installation!
Android Boot Manager is not installed on your device!
It is only available for the Moto G5 (cedric) and for the Volla Phone (yggdrasil)!

YOU CAN LOOSE YOUR DATA! YOU CAN BRICK YOUR DEVICE! YOU CAN LOOSE YOUR IMEI (as with anything on cedric)! YOU CAN LOOSE YOUR MONEY! NOBODY IS RESPONSIBLE EXCEPT YOU! DO AT YOUR OWN RISK AND BE CAREFUL!
Mount if necessary and open Configurator
Config file name (No spaces, no file extension)
Android Boot Manager is installed successfully but the app is not yet finished; blank pages and buttons that do nothing are excepted :(
